20110101013622.000|20110101013623.000|CC1|VEHICLE SALES IS UP EXACTLY 10%.

20110101013640.000|20110101013642.000|CC1|DID BEFORE THE RECESSION.

20110101013644.000|20110101013646.000|CC1|THAT'S CREATED PENT-UP DEMAND

20110101013657.000|20110101013658.000|CC1|ABOUT 30%.

20110101013707.000|20110101013710.000|CC1|PRICES KEEP RISING.             
20110101013710.000|20110101013711.000|CC1|TOYOTA DEALER KURT SCHIELE SEES 
20110101013711.000|20110101013713.000|CC1|CONSUMERS SWITCHING SEAMLESSLY  
20110101013713.000|20110101013714.000|CC1|FROM TRUCKS TO CARS IF PRICES AT
20110101013714.000|20110101013716.000|CC1|THE PUMP SKYROCKET.             
20110101013716.000|20110101013718.000|CC1|>> OUR CORE CARS IN THE TOYOTA  
20110101013718.000|20110101013724.000|CC1|LINEUP ARE CARS LIKE THE PRIUS, 
20110101013724.000|20110101013725.000|CC1|THE COROLLA, THE CAMRY-- THAT   
20110101013725.000|20110101013727.000|CC1|REALLY MAKE UP THE BIG MAJORITY 
20110101013727.000|20110101013728.000|CC1|OF OUR SALES, BECAUSE TOYOTA    
20110101013728.000|20110101013728.000|CC1|DOES SUCH A GREAT JOB WITH THE  
20110101013728.000|20110101013729.000|CC1|PASSENGER CAR MARKET.           
20110101013729.000|20110101013730.000|CC1|AND CARS LIKE THIS SELL WELL TO 
20110101013730.000|20110101013732.000|CC1|BEGIN WITH, BUT ADD THE FUEL
